english:
Phew! So much work!
 Let's work together. 
 Wash the dishes.
 Feed the dog.
 Make the beds. 
Wash the clothes. 
Sweep the floor. 
Take out the rubbish.
Everyone, well done!
Chores can be fun!
chinese:
呼！这么多工作！
让我们一起工作。
洗碗。
喂狗。整理床铺。
洗衣服。
扫地。
倒垃圾。
每个人，做得好！
家务可以很有趣！

english:
May I play outside? 
Yes，but can you tidy your room first?
 OK, that's easy
 Bobby, Can you help me clean the floor?
 Woof! Woof! 
 Go, Bobby! Good job!
 Bobby, Stop! Look! It's so dirty now!
 Woof! Woof! 
 Sam, are you still busy?
 Yes, Dad. I need to clean the floor, the desk and the wall.
chinese:
我可以到外面玩吗？
是的，但你能先整理一下房间吗？
好的，这很简单。
鲍比，你能帮我擦地板吗？
汪！汪！
去吧，鲍比！做得好！
鲍比，停下！看！现在这么脏了！
汪！汪！
山姆，你还在忙吗？
是的，爸爸。我需要擦地板、桌子和墙壁。
